ValidationRule.description: Set up employer contributions prior to Agency load complete
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND
(
RecordTypeId = '0120g000000l3qD',
ISBLANK( Agency_Load_Complete__c ),
NOT(ISBLANK( Set_Up_Employer_Contributions__c ))
), AND
(
RecordTypeId = '012700000001jeX', ISPICKVAL(Onboarding_Process__c,'Agency Integrated Online Enrollment'),
ISBLANK( Agency_Load_Complete__c ),
NOT(ISBLANK( Set_Up_Employer_Contributions__c ))
)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must have a date in the agency load complete field prior to setting up employer contributions
